tiled.core.MapLayer

  • Packages that use MapLayer 
    Package Description
    tiled.core  

    • Uses of MapLayer in tiled.core

      Subclasses of MapLayer in tiled.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ObjectGroup
      A layer containing map objects.
      class  TileLayer
      A TileLayer is a specialized MapLayer, used for tracking two dimensional tile data.
